name: TC06: QueryCart customer should see the basket icon and verify that the ‘Shopping Cart’ menu opens when clicked

steps.name: Given QueryCart customer shopping basket must be visible and active
When QueryCart customer clicks on the shopping basket button
Then QueryCart validates that the customer is in the Shopping Cart menu

labels.value: As a registered user, I want to have a cart on the site and I want to be able to manage these cart operations
